resume.skillmessage: Here you can create a short write-up of your skills to show off to employers

education.description: In high school I was in the architecture program from Fall 2017- June 2019. I also attended College Now Classes in the Spring of 2018. I was also nominated for the National Youth Leadership Forum (NYLF) and I was also nominated for the National Academy for Future Scientists and Technologists.
I was nominated for the National Society of Collegiate Scholars
I am majoring in Computer Science. I am a member of the National Society of Leadership and Success

experience.title: Receptionist | Waiter | Social Media Manager
experience.description: Taste of India II is an indian restuarant in Staten Island, New York. I have been working there since May 2017. I am responsible for setting up the dining room for lunch and dinner. I clean up tables. I handle phone orders as well as online orders. I also take care of the cash management and credit card settling. I am also the social media manager for the restuarant.

experience.title: Intern
experience.description: Hill West is an industry leading architecture firm known for creating beautiful high rise towers in New York City. During my summer internship at Hill West, I learned a about the design proccess when it comes to designing high-rise buildings. I learned basic AutoCad skills and also learned how to virtually model buildings using a program called Sketchup. I helped organize project submittals for 130 William Street. I also made a 3-D model and designed an apartment floor plan for the 160 Clarkson Ave project.

experience.company: Jacques Marchais Museum of Tibetan Art
experience.title: Volunteer
experience.description: Jacques Marchais Museum of Tibetan Art is located in Staten Island, New York. It is home to one of the most extensive collections of Himalayan artifacts. It is a uniquely peaceful retreat that features a beautiful garden. During my time at the museum, I helped take care of the flowers as well as clean up some of the artifacts. I also learned a couple of photography skills while taking photos of Tibetan showcases

experience.title: Volunteer
experience.description: When I volunteer at the temple, I help setup the dining room, serve food, and also cleanup once the event is over.

skills.name: UI/UX/Web Design
skills.description: I have experience with UI/UX/Web Design by testing my skills on personal projects and app prototypes. I use Adobe XD and Adobe Photoshop for these projects.

skills.name: Java
skills.description: I have a good amount of knowledge on java especially since I have been using it for school projects since Fall 2020.

skills.name: Web development
skills.description: Over the last 6 months I have been self-learning HTML/ CSS / JavaScript in order to make websites

skills.name: 3D Modeling
skills.description: I am able to model objects such as houses and buildings by using programs such as Sketchup, Rhino, and AutoCad. I was able to learn and develop these skills during my internship at Hill West Architects.

skills.name: Social Media Marketing
skills.description: I have experience with social media marketing using both facebook and Instagram. I was able to assist Taste of India 2 which is my current part time job, in connecting and gaining more customers through the use of social media.

skills.name: C# and ReactJS
skills.description: I have been trying to learn C# and ReactJS for app and game development for future projects.
